segments.text: OK , Mr . Wu . You may come in . I'm Anne Smith and on my right , my colleague , Anna Duncan , and on my left , Angela Lamb . Do please sit down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Good afternoon Mrs . Smith , Miss Duncan , Miss Lamb .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you think of the weather today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like the weather like this . Cold and rainy . Hope it become sunny as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
